success:
Thanks for choosing oragne shop! Your everlasting support is what helps us grow.
oragne shop acts solely as a forwarding service and does not host any content itself.

CURRENT SHOPS INCLUDED:

World-Digital (https://free.worldigital-brasil.com): This shop contains Switch games and software. Games above 5GB require paid VIP access.
Ghost eShop Retro NX (https://nx-retro.ghostland.at): This shop contains retro roms.
NX Shared Saves (https://nx-saves.ghostland.at): This database contains modified save files that are installable on many games.

Wanna support the project? Star the repo on GitHub: https://github.com/orn8/tinfoil
